power.title: Astral Wasp
power.fluff: A crystalline wasp with gossamer wings appears next to your foe and stings it, then buzzes about, waiting for another opening to attack anyone

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure an astral wasp that appears in 1 square within the target's space. It lasts until the end of your next turn.

The wasp's square is hazardous terrain that deals damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus to anyone who enters it. The squares adjacent to the wasp are difficult terrain.
If the target moves out of the astral wasp's square, it takes damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your Implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Burning Hands
power.fluff: A gout of flame erupts from your hands and scorches nearby foes, some of whom try to evade the flames by dropping down

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target must succeed on a saving throw of be knocked prone.

power.title: Charm of Misplaced Wrath
power.fluff: You bend your foe's mind, filling it with wrath even as you twist its senses

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You slide the target up to 3 squares. The target is then dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target makes a melee basic attack against a creature of your choice as a free reaction. It has a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Chill Strike
power.fluff: You hit your foe with a bolt of frigid energy, reducing its ability to act for a moment

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus cold damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage and cannot take opportunity actions.
